credentials: PHD 2001 Univ of IL at Urbana-Champaign
name: Paul GILDRIE-VOYLES

ratings.comment: Paul is a guy who means business. He has a deep understanding of the course material and is very transparent about what his expectations are. He's a smart guy. My only gripe is that he doesn't seem all that approachable. Whenever I'd speak with him privately, more times than not, I'd leave feeling stupid for asking a question in the first place.
